title: # 513 - Matt Rife & ME
itunes:title: # 513 - Matt Rife & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Matt Rife. We talk about Wild ’n Out, doing edibles with Ralphie May on tour, ghost hunting, his special, and much more!  

 

Follow Matt

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mattrife 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/mattrife 

 

Watch Matt’s new special “Only Fans” on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzgFwZEAHZQ 

 

This episode is brought to you by Famous Smoke Shop. Go to http://www.famous-smoke.com and use the code “BERT” to save $20 off your purchase of $100 or more.

 

This episode is also brought to you by JoyMode. Use the code “BERT’ at check out for 20% off your first order at http://www.usejoymode.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Freeze Pipe. Get 10% off when you use the code “BERT” at http://www.thefreezepipe.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Masterworks. Skip the wait line when you use the code “BERT” at http://www.masterworks.io 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
